document.full_text: muhammad yunus, the bangladeshi nobel peace prize laureate and microfinance pioneer, lost his last appeal to hold on to his job at the bank he had founded.
document.title: nobel laureate loses last legal battle to save job at bank
lines_and_colors: muhammad yunus, the bangladeshi nobel peace prize laureate and microfinance pioneer, lost his last appeal to hold on to his job at the bank he had founded.
